info.name: Inventory Backend API
info.description: Complete API collection for Warehouse + Delivery Agent Sales System with Room Simulation and Storage Suggestions. Includes detailed field descriptions and automatic storage suggestions with vertical stacking support.

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for user login and session management

formdata.description: User email address (required, must be valid email format)
User password (required, plain text, will be validated)

request.description: General login endpoint for both admin and driver users. Returns authentication token and user information.

formdata.description: Driver email address (required, must be valid email format, user must be of type 'driver')
Driver password (required, plain text, will be validated)

request.description: Driver-specific login endpoint. Validates that the user is of type 'driver' before allowing login. Returns 403 if user is not a driver.

formdata.description: Admin email address (required, must be valid email format, user must be of type 'admin')
Admin password (required, plain text, will be validated)

request.description: Admin-specific login endpoint. Validates that the user is of type 'admin' before allowing login. Returns 403 if user is not an admin.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, obtained from login endpoints)

request.description: Logout endpoint. Invalidates the current access token. Requires authentication.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, obtained from login endpoints)

request.description: Get current authenticated user information. Returns user object with id, name, email, type, and timestamps. Requires authentication.

item.name: Categories
item.description: Category management endpoints (Admin only). Categories group products together for better organization.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all categories with their associated products. Returns categories with product_count, total_value, and nested products array. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Category name (required, string, max 255 characters)
Category description (optional, string, can be null)

request.description: Create a new category. Returns the created category object with id, name, description, and timestamps. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Category name (optional if updating, string, max 255 characters)
Category description (optional, string, can be null)

request.description: Update an existing category. All fields are optional (partial update). Returns the updated category object. Admin only. Returns 404 if category not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Category ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Delete a category by ID. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if category not found.

item.name: Products
item.description: Product management endpoints (Admin only). Products are items that can be sold and tracked in inventory.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all products with their categories, warehouse stock, driver stock totals, and total sold quantities. Returns comprehensive product information. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Product name (required, string, max 255 characters)
Product price (required, numeric, minimum 0, decimal with 2 decimal places)
Category ID (required, integer, must exist in categories table)

formdata.value: كيس تسوق بلاستيكي كبير الحجم، مناسب للاستخدام المتكرر
formdata.description: Product description (optional, string, can be null)
Product image URL (optional, string, can be null, should be a valid URL)

request.description: Create a new product. Automatically creates an initial warehouse stock entry with quantity 0. Returns the created product with category and warehouse stock relations. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Product name (optional if updating, string, max 255 characters)
Product price (optional if updating, numeric, minimum 0, decimal with 2 decimal places)
Category ID (optional if updating, integer, must exist in categories table)
Product description (optional, string, can be null)
Product image URL (optional, string, can be null, should be a valid URL)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Update an existing product. All fields are optional (partial update). Returns the updated product with category and warehouse stock relations. Admin only. Returns 404 if product not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Delete a product by ID. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if product not found.

item.name: Warehouse Stock
item.description: Warehouse stock management endpoints (Admin only). Tracks inventory quantities available in the main warehouse.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all warehouse stock entries with product and category information. Returns array of stock objects with product_id, quantity, and nested product/category data. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)
Stock quantity (required, integer, minimum 0, sets the warehouse stock for this product). If quantity is increased, automatic storage suggestions will be included in response.

request.description: Update or create warehouse stock for a product. Uses updateOrCreate, so it will create if it doesn't exist or update if it does. Returns the stock object with product relation. If quantity is increased, automatic storage suggestions with vertical stacking information will be included in the response. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)

request.description: Get storage suggestions for a product based on current warehouse stock. Returns recommended room, placement options with vertical stacking information, and alternative rooms. Requires product dimensions to be set. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Apply a storage suggestion to automatically place items in a room. Creates item placements with vertical stacking support. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all products with warehouse stock that need storage suggestions. Returns list of products with stock quantities and whether they have dimensions defined. Admin only.

item.name: Driver Stock
item.description: Driver stock management endpoints. Track inventory assigned to drivers for sales.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Driver ID (required, integer, must exist and be of type 'driver')

request.description: Get stock for a specific driver. Returns array of driver stock entries with product and category information. Returns 400 if user is not a driver. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Driver ID (required, integer, must exist and be of type 'driver')
Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)
Quantity to assign (required, integer, minimum 1, must be available in warehouse stock)

request.description: Assign stock from warehouse to a driver. Decreases warehouse stock and increases driver stock. Returns 400 if insufficient warehouse stock or if user is not a driver. Returns the updated driver stock with product and driver relations. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be driver)

request.description: Get the authenticated driver's own stock. Returns array of driver stock entries with product and category information. Driver only.

item.name: Sales
item.description: Sales management endpoints. Drivers can create sales, both drivers and admins can view sales.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be driver)

request.description:
Create a new sale. Validates driver stock availability, calculates total amount, creates invoice number, and decreases driver stock. Returns sale details with items. Driver only. Returns 400 if insufficient stock.

Request Body Fields:
- customer_name (required, string, max 255): Name of the customer
- items (required, array, min 1): Array of sale items
  - product_id (required, integer): Product ID that must exist
  - quantity (required, integer, min 1): Quantity to sell

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be driver)

request.description: Get all sales created by the authenticated driver. Returns array of sales with items and product information, ordered by creation date (newest first). Driver only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, admin or driver who made the sale)

variable.description: Sale ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific sale. Returns sale with items, product information, and driver name. Available to both admin and the driver who created the sale. Returns 404 if sale not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, admin or driver who made the sale)

variable.description: Sale ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Generate and return a PDF invoice for a specific sale. Returns PDF file with invoice details. Available to both admin and the driver who created the sale. Returns 403 if unauthorized, 404 if sale not found. Response Content-Type: application/pdf.

item.name: Admin - Drivers
item.description: Driver management endpoints (Admin only). Create, view, update, and delete drivers.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all drivers with their statistics (total_sales, total_revenue, total_stock_items). Returns array of driver objects. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Driver name (required, string, max 255 characters)
Driver email (required, valid email format, must be unique)
Driver password (required, string, minimum 6 characters, will be hashed)

request.description: Create a new driver account. Automatically sets user type to 'driver'. Returns created driver object (without password). Admin only. Returns 422 if email already exists.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Driver ID (required, integer, must exist and be of type 'driver')

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific driver including statistics (total_sales, total_revenue, total_stock_items). Returns driver object with stats. Admin only. Returns 404 if driver not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

formdata.description: Driver name (optional if updating, string, max 255 characters)
Driver email (optional if updating, valid email format, must be unique if provided)
Driver password (optional if updating, string, minimum 6 characters, will be hashed)

variable.description: Driver ID (required, integer, must exist and be of type 'driver')

request.description: Update an existing driver. All fields are optional (partial update). Password will be hashed if provided. Returns updated driver object (without password). Admin only. Returns 404 if driver not found, 422 if email conflict.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Driver ID (required, integer, must exist and be of type 'driver')

request.description: Delete a driver by ID. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if driver not found.

item.name: Admin - Sales
item.description: Admin sales management endpoints. View all sales across all drivers.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all sales across all drivers. Returns array of sales with driver information and items with product details, ordered by creation date (newest first). Admin only.

item.name: Admin Stats
item.description: Admin dashboard statistics endpoints. Provides comprehensive analytics and metrics.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description:
Get comprehensive dashboard statistics. Returns:
- total_products: Total number of products
- total_drivers: Total number of drivers
- total_sales: Total number of sales
- total_revenue: Sum of all sales amounts
- today_sales: Number of sales today
- today_revenue: Revenue from today's sales
- low_stock_products: Products with warehouse quantity < 10 (array with product_id, product_name, quantity)
- sales_by_day: Sales statistics for last 7 days (date, count, revenue)
- top_drivers: Top 5 drivers by sales count (id, name, total_sales, total_revenue)

Admin only.

item.name: Room Management
item.description: Room management endpoints (Admin only). Rooms represent physical storage spaces in warehouses with 3D dimensions.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all rooms with warehouse information. Returns array of room objects with dimensions (width, depth, height in cm), status, and warehouse relation. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Main Storage Room A",
    "description": "Primary storage room for general products",
    "width": 1000,
    "depth": 800,
    "height": 300,
    "warehouse_id": 1,
    "status": "active",
    "max_weight": 10000
}

request.description:
Create a new room. Dimensions are in centimeters (cm). Returns the created room object with warehouse relation. Admin only.

Request Body Fields:
- name (required, string): Room name
- width (required, numeric, min: 1): Room width in cm
- depth (required, numeric, min: 1): Room depth in cm
- height (required, numeric, min: 1): Room height in cm
- warehouse_id (optional, integer): Warehouse ID
- description (optional, string): Room description
- status (optional, enum): 'active', 'inactive', or 'maintenance'
- max_weight (optional, numeric): Maximum weight capacity in kg

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific room including layouts. Returns room object with warehouse and layouts relations. Admin only. Returns 404 if room not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Update an existing room. All fields are optional (partial update). Returns the updated room object. Admin only. Returns 404 if room not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Delete a room by ID. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if room not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get statistics for a specific room including dimensions, volume, floor area, and latest layout information. Returns room stats with utilization data. Admin only.

item.name: Product Dimensions
item.description: Product dimensions management endpoints (Admin only). Define physical dimensions (width, depth, height) for products to enable room simulation and storage suggestions.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

request.description: Get all products with their dimensions. Returns array of product dimension objects with product relation. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)

request.description: Get dimensions for a specific product. Returns product dimension object with product relation. Admin only. Returns 404 if dimensions not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)

request.description:
Create dimensions for a product. Dimensions are in centimeters (cm), weight in kilograms (kg). Returns the created dimension object. Admin only. Returns 400 if dimensions already exist.

Request Body Fields:
- width (required, numeric, min: 0.01): Product width in cm
- depth (required, numeric, min: 0.01): Product depth in cm
- height (required, numeric, min: 0.01): Product height in cm
- weight (optional, numeric, min: 0): Product weight in kg
- rotatable (optional, boolean): Whether item can be rotated (default: true)
- fragile (optional, boolean): Whether item is fragile (default: false)

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)

request.description: Update dimensions for a product. All fields are optional (partial update). Returns the updated dimension object. Admin only. Returns 404 if dimensions not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Product ID (required, integer, must exist in products table)

request.description: Delete dimensions for a product. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if dimensions not found.

item.name: Room Layouts
item.description: Room layout generation and management endpoints (Admin only). Generate optimal 3D layouts using LAFF + MaxRects algorithm with vertical stacking support.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description:
Generate an optimal 3D layout for a room using LAFF + MaxRects algorithm. Automatically handles vertical stacking of same products. Returns layout with placements, utilization percentage, and unplaced items. Admin only.

Request Body Fields:
- algorithm (optional, string): 'laff_maxrects', 'maxrects', or 'skyline' (default: 'laff_maxrects')
- allow_rotation (optional, boolean): Allow item rotation (default: true)
- items (required, array): Array of items to place
  - product_id (required, integer): Product ID
  - quantity (required, integer, min: 1): Number of items
  - dimensions (optional, object): Override product dimensions
    - width, depth, height (numeric): Dimensions in cm
- options (optional, object): Algorithm options
  - max_layers (optional, integer): Maximum vertical layers
  - prefer_bottom (optional, boolean): Prefer bottom placement (default: true)
  - minimize_height (optional, boolean): Minimize total height

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get the latest layout for a room. Returns layout object with placements, utilization data, and algorithm information. Admin only. Returns 404 if no layout found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Update layout data manually. Updates the layout_data JSON field. Admin only. Returns 404 if no layout found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Re-optimize an existing layout. Regenerates layout using current placements to improve space utilization. Returns optimized layout. Admin only. Returns 404 if no layout found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Delete the latest layout for a room. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if no layout found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get all item placements for a room's latest layout. Returns array of placement objects with product information and 3D coordinates (x, y, z). Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description:
Manually add an item placement to a room's layout. Coordinates are in centimeters (cm). Z=0 is ground level. Admin only.

Request Body Fields:
- product_id (required, integer): Product ID
- x_position (required, numeric, min: 0): X coordinate in cm (from left wall)
- y_position (required, numeric, min: 0): Y coordinate in cm (from front wall)
- z_position (required, numeric, min: 0): Z coordinate in cm (from floor, ground level = 0)
- width (required, numeric, min: 0.01): Item width in cm
- depth (required, numeric, min: 0.01): Item depth in cm
- height (required, numeric, min: 0.01): Item height in cm
- rotation (optional, enum): '0', '90', '180', or '270' (default: '0')

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Placement ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Update an item placement position or dimensions. All fields are optional (partial update). Admin only. Returns 404 if placement not found.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Placement ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Delete an item placement. Returns success message. Admin only. Returns 404 if placement not found.

item.name: Room Visualization
item.description: Room visualization endpoints (Admin only). Get layout data in various formats for frontend rendering (2D, 3D, grid).

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get complete visualization data for a room's latest layout. Returns room dimensions, layout information, and all placements with product details. Includes stack information for vertical stacking visualization. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get grid-based visualization data for 2D top-down view. Returns room dimensions and array of placement coordinates. Admin only.

header.description: Bearer token for authentication (required, must be admin)

variable.description: Room ID (required, integer, must exist in database)

request.description: Get 3D visualization data for Three.js or React Three Fiber rendering. Returns room dimensions and array of 3D objects with positions, dimensions, rotations, and stack information. Admin only.

Check API health status. Returns status, message, and current timestamp. No authentication required. Useful for monitoring and load balancer health checks.

Response Fields:

- message: Status message
- timestamp: Current server time in ISO8601 format
